Description: Minimal required set of individual-level clinical data that is considered fixed
DependsOn: Atlas Participant ID,Atlas Group,Sex,Race,Ethnicity,Age at Menarche,Class BRCA1, Class BRCA2,Menopause Status, Timepoint Label, Age, Weight, Height, BMI, Menopause Status, Menopause Cycle Stage, Gravidity, Parity, Primary Diagnosis, Previous Diagnosis, Tobacco Use, Pack Years Smoked, Alcohol Use, Drinks Per Week, Antibiotic Use, Sample ID, Sample Collection Center, Sample Site, Tumor Grade, Status ER, Status PR, Status HER2

Description: Minimal required set of sample-level clinical data
DependsOn: Sample ID, Sample Collection Center, Sample Site, Tumor Grade, Status ER, Status PR, Status HER2

Description: The Atlas team contributing this data
DependsOn: Brugge, Ellisen, Nathanson, Eng, Sung, Drapkin, Velculescu
